attributes.action: make going to prison unpleasant &  make prisoners do hard labour
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Government needs to get tuff. Making prison unpleasant would make people think twice about crime. At the moment it is a holiday camp with many privileges. Go back to basics! Take All!! leisure privileges away, No tele, No gym, etc. Excercise yard yes, Education yes, Skill learning yes and also make prisoners work. Work on Road repairs, Motorway repairs by hand, Back to basics & Cleanup countryside. Prison repairs decorating, Ground maintenance all under guard. Obviously some prisoners are dangerious so keep in, working, cleaning duties etc. Any payment to prisoners Minimal tobacco allowance or a packet of biscuits or a Gym activity, that is their privelege. Allow prison offices to carry stun guns with comprehensive training to control. Make young offenders 15-23yrs male or female go into the Army min 18mth attendance. People would Not want to commit a crime so money would be saved on labour & housing these criminals; Stop their rights, they gave them up when they committed the crimes

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
